item.title: [Rs2][Srl] Dwarven miner bseion 1.0 - BETA -
item.dc:creator: @solemn_wishes solemn wishes
item.description:
@solemn_wishes wrote:

[CENTER]

Dwarven Miner version 1.0 - BETA -

hi guys,

       well im pretty happy to be releasing the *beta* version of my latest script the Dwarven  miner and banker, a vast ammount of time has been spent in the making of this script but due to some problems at my house i am unable to test it proply but would be very gratefull if a few of you would try it out and test it for yourselves.

With this script i have been able to make all procedures and functions self working and there is no need to set up anything, just simply set your player[s] details and hit run.

a general notice - if anyone has any comments on this functionp lease say so…im not to sure if you guys will take to kindly to it.

[/CENTER]

[CODE]function calculate:boolean;
var Wlvl, lvl : integer;
Clvl : integer;
begin

Clvl:= GetSkillAmount(‘mining’);
lvl:= Clvl;
Wlvl:= Clvl;

 repeat
      lvl:= lvl+1;
  until(lvl=30)or(lvl=99)

 if (lvl=99) then
   begin
      iron:=   '1';
      coal:=   '1';
      result:=true;

 end  else

 begin
 iron:=   '1';
 coal:=   '1';
   repeat
       Wlvl:=Wlvl+1;
          if(Wlvl=15)then
            begin
              iron:= '2';
             end;
          if(Wlvl=30)then
            begin
              coal:='2';
            end;
        until(Wlvl=99)
    end;
  begin
      if iron= '1'     then iron:= 'Iron'  else iron:='';
      if coal= '1'     then coal:= 'Coal'  else coal:='';
end;
CopperC  :=  4747935;
tinC     :=  8092548;
if(iron='iron')then ironC:=  2503250 else ironC:= tinC;
if(coal='coal')then coalC:=  2571067 else coalC:= CopperC;

end;[/CODE]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[center]

                      .Instructions.
  1. USE Runescape with HIGH Detail, Very Bright.
  2. Set your Screen to 32 bit TRUE color.
  3. Set Playernames, Passwords ect ect…
  4. Start location : please refer to line 57-58
  5. Be sure to have a pickaxe somewhere (inventory/equipted)

Features.

  • SELF setup, rock color picking and random rock type selection.
  • SRL Based.
  • Auto Handling Randoms.
  • most if nto all procedures are fail-safed

Known Issues.

  • NONE PLEASE REPORT THEN BUGS I KNOW THEY ARE THERE…

General Notice:

Use this script at your own risk. I’m NOT responsible for any Ban or Loss you might encounter using this script.

NAME : Dwarven Miner version 1.0 - BETA -
WRITER : Solemn wishes
CATEGORY : Miner/banker
DESCRIPTION : currently on beta version
AUTOCOLOR : Yes.
SRL REV. : #317+.

Enjoy[/center]

Read full topic
